title: SI Initiate Session Request
description: Host initiates a session with a brand agent

context.description: Conversation handoff from the host describing what the user needs

media_buy_id.description: AdCP media buy ID if session was triggered by advertising

offering_token.description: Token from si_get_offering response for session continuity. Brand uses this to recall what products were shown to the user, enabling natural references like 'the second one' or 'that blue shoe'.
